title: PM Kisan Yojana
description: Income support of ₹6,000 per year to small and marginal farmers.

title: Ayushman Bharat – PMJAY
description: Health insurance coverage up to ₹5 lakh per family per year.

title: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana
description: Affordable housing with interest subsidy for urban and rural poor.

title: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana
description: Free LPG connections to women from BPL households.

title: Startup India Scheme
description: Support for startups with tax exemption and funding opportunities.

title: Yuva Nidhi Scheme
description: Monthly unemployment allowance for graduates in Karnataka.
eligibility: Graduates and diploma holders in Karnataka

title: Rythu Bandhu Scheme
description: Seasonal investment support to farmers in Telangana.

title: TN Free Laptop Scheme
description: Free laptops for Class 10–12 and first-year college students in Tamil Nadu.
eligibility: Students in government/aided schools or colleges

title: Delhi Ladli Scheme
description: Incentivizes girl child welfare and education in Delhi.
eligibility: Girl children born in Delhi with correct documentation

title: Mukhyamantri Amrutum Yojana
description: Health coverage for BPL families in Gujarat.

title: Subhadra Yojana
description: Cash incentives for married women in Odisha.
eligibility: Odisha women married and residing in-state

title: Aasara Pension Scheme
description: Monthly pensions for senior citizens, widows, disabled in Telangana.

title: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana
description: Support for farmers through subsidies for inputs and infrastructure.

title: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana
description: Loans up to ₹10 lakh for non-corporate small/micro enterprises.

title: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao
description: Promotes welfare and education for the girl child.
eligibility: Girl children under the scheme's guidelines

title: PM Suraksha Bima Yojana
description: Accident insurance of ₹2 lakh for just ₹12/year.

title: Atal Pension Yojana
description: Guaranteed monthly pension for unorganized sector workers.

title: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
description: Crop insurance premium support for farmers.
